entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Roberval
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 p.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
